reviewText: I really like this show because it is very inspiring and the relationship that they have is great to watch.  I have struggle with my weight since having my kids and watching this I am motivated to get up and do something about it. You can tell they just have great hearts and they are open and honest with each other and I like to see that in a family.
This was a wonderful help in encouraging me to lose weight. I loved the way the family came together to complete the goal to lose weight.
